original_text: This shows us the ancestors of Aaron and Moses. They were the men to whom the Lord spoke. He said to them, ‘Lead the Israelites out of Egypt. Lead them out in their families and clans, like an army.’
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손을 그들의 군대대로 애굽 땅에서 인도하라 하신 여호와의 명령을 받은 자는 이 아론과 모세요

sentences.original_text: This shows us the ancestors of Aaron and Moses.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 아론과 모세의 조상들을 우리에게 보여줍니다.

sentences.original_text: They were the men to whom the Lord spoke.
Lead them out in their families and clans,
